column5: Casa South Fork is situated six miles north of Study Butte off of Highway 118 in a secluded homestead area. The charming 1,500 square-foot home was built atop a mesa with astounding panoramic views of the Big Bend National Park and beyond.  Casa South Fork is a comfortable, spacious, and beautiful 3 bedroom/ 2 bath home that is well maintained on 38 acres.  Casa South Fork offers some of the best scenery and most diverse plant and wildlife that the Chihuahuan Desert has to offer.
